lender.name: Rachel

Because I can
Because I believe the best way to raise a society out of poverty is through the industry and actions of individuals within that society.
Because I am grateful I am in a position where I am able to provide the initial help that those individuals need to improve their lives and the lives of those they love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mechanical engineer on Water and Wastewater projects. I am mainly based in a design office.

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: During my travels I saw that the need for help is huge.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: lawyer

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: I recognize that God put me in a country where there is great freedom, and a lot of resources. I need to share that with some one that needs help, but doesn't have the same resources.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the emergency department, of a hospital. People come there when they are very sick or injured.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to help women to become independent and successful.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research on how children learn language.

lender.name: Desiree
lender.loan_because: I wanted to open up opportunities to others in the same way opportunities were opened up for me. My college education was made possible through student loans. I hope that the loans I contribute to impact the lives of people in similar ways that my own life was impacted.

lender.name: PET LIM & JASON
lender.loan_because: I was amazed by so many generous and kind people in Kiva. I feel so proud to do the same thing with you all at here. We always said, if only there is a chance! So, at here, we are provide a chance for people to improve their life! As I hope a day in my life! Good luck all!

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I like to help people, to the glory of God.
lender.occupational_info: Fire fighting and rescue...working for a Municipal fire department to put out fires and to rescue people. I am now retired after 27-years of service.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I love helping people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in allowing individuals an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I provide services to other companies to better their business.

lender.name: Dawit

lender.name: Marcus

lender.name: Jon

lender.name: Doc Ryan

lender.occupational_info: I help soldiers and civilians alike with their illnesses and injuries the best I can.

lender.occupational_info: We are building our own house, and although I do not get paid it is so rewarding.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: It's awesome to be able to reach out and help someone oceans apart without any effort on my part. My loans have been repaid at 100% and I can continue to reloan. Everybody loves to help someone who is helping themself. Simple concept - great results.

lender.loan_because: I have a heart for the poor and have dedicated my life to advocating for those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student majoring in human resources with a minor in Spanish as well as Labor and Employment studies. I go to class each day and learn how to develop organizations. In addition to another part time job in customer service, I have devoted a large part of my life to a non-profit organization called People Helping Everyone Eat Daily (PHEED) that I co-founded this past year. Our objective is to connect an abundance of food on college campuses to a shortage of food in nearby areas.
